name.ja: <ruby>白<rt>しろ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>威<rt>い</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Show up to 3 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon(s)" from your hand, face-up field, and/or GY, then destroy that many cards your opponent controls. You can banish this card from your GY; Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing "Blue-Eyes White Dragon(s)" from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of that Ritual Monster. You can only use each effect of "Majesty with Dragons of White" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Advent of the Eyes of Blue
